summary.span: 表示無法選取的 ，其可呈現文字和影像，並可顯示超連結。

span.span: Represents a nonselectable that renders text and images and can display hyperlinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別來建立可呈現文字和影像可實作標籤和屬性。Use the class to create a label that can render text and images that can implement the and properties. 也有許多屬性，使其顯示的一或多個超連結和其他修改的外觀和行為的超連結的屬性。The also has many properties that enable it to display one or more hyperlinks, and other properties that modify the appearance and behavior of hyperlinks. 就像是，不會根據預設取得焦點和，不會呈現為推入或反白顯示。The is like a that does not get focus by default and that does not render as pushed or highlighted. 當主控項目的支援便捷鍵。 as a hosted item supports access keys. 使用， ，和屬性支援中的連結控制。Use the , , and properties on a to support link control in a . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化藉由設定包含連結， ， ， ，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a to contain a link by setting the , , , , and properties. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color ActiveLinkColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };
member this.ActiveLinkColor : System.Drawing.Color with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定顯示作用中連結的色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the color used to display an active link.

value.span: ，表示作用中連結顯示的色彩。

span.span: A that represents the color to display an active link.

value.span: 預設色彩是由系統所指定。

span.span: The default color is specified by the system.
Typically, this color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作用中連結會是正在被按下的連結。An active link is a link that is in the process of being clicked. 這是類似於使用的狀態的控制項。This is similar to the depressed state of a control. 您可以使用這個屬性來指定程序在按下連結時，將會顯示在的連結的色彩。You can use this property to specify the color that the link is displayed in when the link is in the process of being clicked. 沒有與連結相關聯的色彩數目。There are a number of colors associated with a link. 指定顯示中的所有連結的色彩控制項。The specifies the color of all links displayed in the control. 屬性可讓您指定的連結色彩之後使用者已瀏覽。The property enables you to specify the color of a link after it has been visited by the user. > [!NOTE] > 設定此屬性時，確保色彩設定要與控制項的背景色彩的不衝突的屬性，或未正確顯示文字。When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly. 例如，如果控制項的背景色彩為`Color.Red`和此屬性設定為`Color.Red`，文字不會顯示正確連結正在被按下。For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is in the process of being clicked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化藉由設定包含連結， ， ， ，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a to contain a link by setting the , , , , and properties. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::LinkBehavior LinkBehavior { System::Windows::Forms::LinkBehavior get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::LinkBehavior value); };
member this.LinkBehavior : System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示連結的行為。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the behavior of a link.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您在控制項中顯示時，指定連結的行為。This property enables you to specify the behavior of links when they are displayed in the control. 例如，如果您想滑鼠指標位在連結時，才會顯示與底線的連結，您可以設定此屬性`LinkBehavior.HoverUnderline`。For example, if you want links to be displayed with an underline only when the mouse pointer is over a link, you can set this property to `LinkBehavior.HoverUnderline`. 多個可以與連結相關聯的行為的類型的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about the types of behaviors that can be associated with a link, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化藉由設定包含連結， ， ， ，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a to contain a link by setting the , , , , and properties. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，表示是否應該將連結顯示為已瀏覽。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a link should be displayed as though it were visited.

value.span: 如果連結應顯示為已瀏覽則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if links should display as though they were visited; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項並不會自動代表連結是瀏覽過的連結。A control does not automatically denote that a link is a visited link. 若要將連結顯示為已瀏覽的連結，您可以設定這個屬性的值`true`的 click 事件的事件處理常式中。To display the link as a visited link, you can set the value of this property to `true` in an event handler for the click event of the . 瀏覽過的連結會顯示使用中指定的色彩屬性控制項。A visited link is displayed using the color specified in the property of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化藉由設定包含連結， ， ， ，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a to contain a link by setting the , , , , and properties. Protected Overrides Sub OnFontChanged (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override bool ProcessMnemonic (char charCode);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance bool ProcessMnemonic(char charCode) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Function ProcessMnemonic (charCode As Char) As Boolean
protected public: override bool ProcessMnemonic(char charCode);

span.span: The character to process.

summary.span: 處理助憶鍵字元。

span.span: Processes a mnemonic character.

returns.span: 如果控制項已將字元當成助憶鍵處理，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法是提供項目有機會處理助憶鍵字元。This method is called to give an item the opportunity to process a mnemonic character. 方法應該決定是否在項目處於的狀態處理助憶鍵，是否指定的字元是否表示助憶鍵。The method should determine whether the item is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic. 如果因此，此方法應該執行的助憶鍵和傳回相關聯的動作`true`。If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`. 如果不是，這個方法應傳回`false`。If not, the method should return `false`. 實作依賴主機控制項以呼叫方法來判斷指定的字元是否符合的項目文字的助憶鍵。The implementation relies on the host control to call the method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the item's text. 在此情況下，選取具有標籤關聯之項目的方法，或者引發事件，如果無法選取項目。In this case, the method selects the item associated with the label, or raises the event if the item cannot be selected.

permission.span: 繼承類別呼叫這個方法的所有視窗。

span.span: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
Associated enumeration: value of .

span.span: A that represents the color used to display links that have been visited.

value.span: 預設色彩是由系統所指定。

span.span: The default color is specified by the system.
Typically, this color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您指定顯示中的所有連結的色彩，瀏覽過的使用者。This property enables you to specify the color that is displayed for all links in the that have been visited by the user. > [!NOTE] > 設定此屬性時，確保色彩設定要與控制項的背景色彩的不衝突的屬性，或未正確顯示文字。When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly. 例如，如果控制項的背景色彩為`Color.Red`和此屬性設定為`Color.Red`，文字不會顯示正確的連結顯示為已瀏覽連結時。For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is displayed as a visited link. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化藉由設定包含連結， ， ， ，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a to contain a link by setting the , , , , and properties. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel/VB/form1.vb#1)]
